meanings.definition: To allow oneself too much of something enjoyable, especially food or drink.
meanings.sent1: She overindulges in sweets and cakes every day.
meanings.sent2: He often overindulges in pizza on weekends.
meanings.sent3: At the party, she overindulges in cookies and ends up feeling sick.
meanings.sent4: His love for ice cream overindulges his taste buds with sweetness.
meanings.sent5: The buffet overindulges guests with a variety of delicious treats.

meanings.definition: To give oneself too much of something enjoyable, especially food or drink.
meanings.sent1: They overindulge their guests with a lavish feast during the holidays.
meanings.sent2: The chef overindulges the customers with generous portions of dessert.
meanings.sent3: The restaurant overindulges its patrons with free appetizers.
meanings.sent4: The bakery overindulges its customers with freshly baked pastries.
meanings.sent5: The host overindulges the party attendees with an abundance of drinks.
